text: Tap ogɨnap sek tawɨl dɨl mani awl delɨgɨpal, mab chusɨn kuy yɨdek tek okok, sɨnɨb okok, tap dagɨlel kuy tep owep okok, tap mok kuy tep owep okok, sada kuy tep owep okok agak. Ñɨg wayn, mab olip wel, wit mɨdup, pilawa tap okok agak. Chag bulmakaw, chag sipsip, chag hos okok, tap chag hos tun gel lɨpɨg dad ajɨpal okok agak. Pen binɨb yɨbɨl kɨlop nag tunɨg dad amɨl, mani dɨpal okok sek agak. Tap anɨb okok mɨdupsek, bɨ olap tawnɨmuŋ tek ma mɨdeb agak.
